casebody.data:
No. 11-492. Law Offices of Mitchell N. Kay, PC, Petitioner v. Darwin Lesher. 565 U.S. 1185, 132 S. Ct. 1143, 2012 U.S. LEXIS 967.

181 L. Ed. 2d 1030,

January 23, 2012.

Motion of Commercial Law League of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of ACA International for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of National Association of Retail Collection Attorneys for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 650 F.3d 993.
